greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, a partition number generator; A145006 * the diagonalized variant of A000041, (A174712).
comment: Row sums = the partition numbers, A000041 starting with offset 1.
The triangle demonstrates an equivalency to Euler's pentagonal recurrence
relation, such that sum of n-th row terms = rightmost term of next row, a
A174739 is equivalent to Euler's pentagonal theorem in triangular form.
formula: Given triangle A145006, delete the first "1", = triangle Q. With M = A174712,
the diagonalize variant of the partition numbers, perform Q*M as infinite lower
example: First few rows of the triangle =
